## IBubble.moveDuringDrag() method

Move this bubble during a drag, taking into account whether or not there is a drag surface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moveDuringDrag(dragSurface: BlockDragSurfaceSvg | null, newLoc: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dragSurface | [BlockDragSurfaceSvg](./blockly.blockdragsurfacesvg_class.md) \| null | The surface that carries rendered items during a drag, or null if no drag surface is in use. |
|  newLoc | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | The location to translate to, in workspace coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
